00014 #ifndef ULIB_HASH_MAP_H

00019 typedef uint32_t (*uPFpcu) (const char* t, uint32_t tlen);
00020 typedef void     (*vPFprpv)(UStringRep* key, void* elem);
00021 typedef bool     (*bPFprpv)(UStringRep* key, void* elem);
00022 
00023                    class UCDB;
00024 template <class T> class UVector;
00025 
00026 class U_NO_EXPORT UHashMapNode {
00027 public:
00028         // Check for memory error
00029         U_MEMORY_TEST
00030 
00031         // Allocator e Deallocator
00032         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00033         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00034 
00035         void* elem;
00036         UStringRep* key;
00037         UHashMapNode* next;
00038         uint32_t hash;
00039 
00040         // COSTRUTTORI
00041 
00042         UHashMapNode(const UString& _key, void* _elem, UHashMapNode* _next, uint32_t _hash)
00043                         : elem(_elem), key(_key.rep), next(_next), hash(_hash)
00044                 {
00045                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMapNode, "%.*S,%p,%p,%u", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_key), _elem, _next, _hash)
00046 
00047                 key->hold(); // NB: si incrementa la reference della stringa...
00048                 }
00049 
00050         UHashMapNode(UHashMapNode* n, UHashMapNode* _next) : elem(n->elem), key(n->key), next(_next), hash(n->hash)
00051                 {
00052                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMapNode, "%p,%p", n, _next)
00053 
00054                 key->hold(); // NB: si incrementa la reference della stringa...
00055                 }
00056 
00057         ~UHashMapNode()
00058                 {
00059                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMapNode)
00060 
00061                 key->release(); // NB: si decrementa la reference della stringa...
00062                 }
00063 
00064 #ifdef DEBUG
00065         U_EXPORT const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00066 #endif
00067 };
00068 
00069 template <class T> class UHashMap;
00070 
00071 template <> class U_EXPORT UHashMap<void*> {
00072 public:
00073         static uPFpcu gperf;
00074 
00075         // Check for memory error
00076         U_MEMORY_TEST
00077 
00078         // Allocator e Deallocator
00079         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00080         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00081 
00082         // Costruttori e distruttore
00083 
00084         UHashMap(bool _ignore_case = false)
00085                 {
00086                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<void*>, "%b", _ignore_case)
00087 
00088                 ignore_case = _ignore_case;
00089 
00090                 _length = _capacity = _space = 0;
00091                 }
00092 
00093         ~UHashMap()
00094                 {
00095                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<void*>)
00096                 }
00097 
00098         // allocate and deallocate methods
00099 
00100         void allocate(uint32_t n = 64)
00101                 {
00102                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::allocate(%u)", n)
00103 
00104                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00105 
00106                 table     = U_MALLOC_VECTOR(n, UHashMapNode);
00107                 _capacity = n;
00108 
00109                 (void) memset(table, '\0', n * sizeof(UHashMapNode*));
00110                 }
00111 
00112         void deallocate()
00113                 {
00114                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::deallocate()")
00115 
00116                 U_CHECK_MEMORY
00117 
00118                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MAJOR(_capacity, 0)
00119 
00120                 U_FREE_VECTOR(table, _capacity, UHashMapNode);
00121 
00122                 _capacity = 0;
00123                 }
00124 
00125         // Size and Capacity
00126 
00127         uint32_t size() const
00128                 {
00129                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::size()")
00130 
00131                 U_RETURN(_length);
00132                 }
00133 
00134         uint32_t capacity() const
00135                 {
00136                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::capacity()")
00137 
00138                 U_RETURN(_capacity);
00139                 }
00140 
00141         uint32_t space() const
00142                 {
00143                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::space()")
00144 
00145                 U_RETURN(_space);
00146                 }
00147 
00148         void setSpace(uint32_t s)
00149                 {
00150                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::setSpace(%u)", s)
00151 
00152                 _space = s;
00153                 }
00154 
00155         bool empty() const
00156                 {
00157                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::empty()")
00158 
00159                 U_RETURN(_length == 0);
00160                 }
00161 
00162         void setIgnoreCase(bool flag)
00163                 {
00164                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::setIgnoreCase(%b)", flag)
00165 
00166                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(_length, 0)
00167 
00168                 ignore_case = flag;
00169                 }
00170 
00171         bool ignoreCase() const { return ignore_case; }
00172 
00173         // Ricerche
00174 
00175         bool find(const UString& key)
00176                 {
00177                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::find(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key))
00178 
00179                 lookup(key);
00180 
00181                 U_RETURN(node != NULL);
00182                 }
00183 
00184         // Set/get methods
00185 
00186         void* operator[](const char* key)        { UStringRep keyr(key); return at(&keyr); }
00187         void* operator[](const UString& key) {                                                           return at(key.rep); }
00188 
00189         void*       elem() const { return node->elem; }
00190         UStringRep*  key() const { return node->key; }
00191 
00192         // dopo avere chiamato find() (non effettuano il lookup)
00193 
00194         void  eraseAfterFind();
00195         void insertAfterFind(const UString& key, void* elem);
00196 
00197         void replaceAfterFind(void* elem)
00198                 {
00199                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::replaceAfterFind(%p)", elem)
00200 
00201                 // presuppone l'elemento da sostituire all'inizio della lista
00202                 // delle collisioni - lista self-organizing (move-to-front)...
00203 
00204                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(node, table[index])
00205 
00206                 node->elem = elem;
00207                 }
00208 
00209         void* erase(const UString& key);
00210 
00211         // Make room for a total of n element
00212 
00213         void reserve(uint32_t n);
00214 
00215         // Call function for all entry
00216 
00217         bool next();
00218         bool first();
00219 
00220         void callForAllEntry(vPFprpv function);
00221 
00222         void getKeys(UVector<UString>& vec);
00223 
00224         void callForAllEntrySorted(vPFprpv function)
00225                 {
00226                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<void*>::callForAllEntrySorted(%p)", function)
00227 
00228                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00229 
00230                 if (_length < 2)
00231                         {
00232                         callForAllEntry(function);
00233 
00234                         return;
00235                         }
00236 
00237                 _callForAllEntrySorted(function);
00238                 }
00239 
00240         static void stopCallForAllEntry() { stop_call_for_all_entry = true; }
00241 
00242 #ifdef DEBUG
00243         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00244 #endif
00245 
00246 protected:
00247         UHashMapNode* node;
00248         UHashMapNode** table;
00249         uint32_t _length, _capacity, _space, index, hash;
00250         bool ignore_case;
00251 
00252         static bool stop_call_for_all_entry;
00253 
00254         // Find a elem in the array with <key>
00255 
00256         void* at(UStringRep* keyr);
00257         void  lookup(UStringRep* keyr);
00258         void  lookup(const UString& key) { return lookup(key.rep); }
00259 
00260         void _callForAllEntrySorted(vPFprpv function);
00261 
00262 private:
00263         UHashMap<void*>(const UHashMap<void*>&)            {}
00264         UHashMap<void*>& operator=(const UHashMap<void*>&) { return *this; }
00265 
00266         friend class UCDB;
00267 };
00268 
00269 template <class T> class U_EXPORT UHashMap<T*> : public UHashMap<void*> {
00270 public:
00271 
00272         // Costruttori e distruttore
00273 
00274         UHashMap(bool _ignore_case = false) : UHashMap<void*>(_ignore_case)
00275                 {
00276                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<T*>, "%b", _ignore_case)
00277                 }
00278 
00279         ~UHashMap()
00280                 {
00281                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<T*>)
00282                 }
00283 
00284         // Inserimento e cancellazione elementi dalla tabella
00285 
00286         T* erase(const UString& key)
00287                 { return (T*) UHashMap<void*>::erase(key); }
00288 
00289         T* elem() const { return (T*) UHashMap<void*>::elem(); }
00290 
00291         T* operator[](const char*    key) { return (T*) UHashMap<void*>::operator[](key); }
00292         T* operator[](const UString& key) { return (T*) UHashMap<void*>::operator[](key); }
00293 
00294         void eraseAfterFind()
00295                 {
00296                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::eraseAfterFind()")
00297 
00298                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(node)
00299 
00300                 u_destroy<T>((T*)node->elem);
00301 
00302                 UHashMap<void*>::eraseAfterFind();
00303                 }
00304 
00305         void insertAfterFind(const UString& key, void* elem)
00306                 {
00307                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::insertAfterFind(%.*S,%p)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), elem)
00308 
00309                 u_construct<T>((T*)elem);
00310 
00311                 if (node)
00312                         {
00313                         u_destroy<T>((T*)node->elem);
00314 
00315                         node->elem = elem;
00316                         }
00317                 else
00318                         {
00319                         UHashMap<void*>::insertAfterFind(key, elem);
00320                         }
00321                 }
00322 
00323         void replaceAfterFind(void* elem)
00324                 {
00325                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::replaceAfterFind(%p)", elem)
00326 
00327                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(node)
00328 
00329                 u_construct<T>((T*)elem);
00330                   u_destroy<T>((T*)node->elem);
00331 
00332                 UHashMap<void*>::replaceAfterFind(elem);
00333                 }
00334 
00335         // Sets a field, overwriting any existing value
00336 
00337         void insert(const UString& key, void* elem)
00338                 {
00339                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::insert(%.*S,%p)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), elem)
00340 
00341                 UHashMap<void*>::lookup(key);
00342 
00343                 insertAfterFind(key, elem);
00344                 }
00345 
00346         // Cancellazione tabella
00347 
00348         void clear()
00349                 {
00350                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::clear()")
00351 
00352                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00353 
00354 #  ifdef DEBUG
00355                 int sum = 0, max = 0, min = 1024, width;
00356 #  endif
00357 
00358                 T* elem;
00359                 UHashMapNode* next;
00360 
00361                 for (index = 0; index < _capacity; ++index)
00362                         {
00363                         if (table[index])
00364                                 {
00365                                 node = table[index];
00366 
00367 #        ifdef DEBUG
00368                                 ++sum;
00369                                 width = -1;
00370 #        endif
00371 
00372                                 do {
00373 #           ifdef DEBUG
00374                                         ++width;
00375 #           endif
00376 
00377                                         next =      node->next;
00378                                         elem = (T*) node->elem;
00379 
00380                                         u_destroy<T>(elem);
00381 
00382                                         delete node;
00383                                         }
00384                                 while ((node = next));
00385 
00386 #        ifdef DEBUG
00387                                 if (max < width) max = width;
00388                                 if (min > width) min = width;
00389 #        endif
00390 
00391                                 table[index] = 0;
00392                                 }
00393                         }
00394 
00395                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("collision(min,max) = (%d,%d) - distribution = %f", min, max, (double)_length / (double)sum)
00396 
00397                 _length = 0;
00398                 }
00399 
00400         void callWithDeleteForAllEntry(bPFprpv function)
00401                 {
00402                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::callWithDeleteForAllEntry(%p)", function)
00403 
00404                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00405 
00406                 T* elem;
00407                 UHashMapNode** ptr;
00408 
00409                 for (index = 0; index < _capacity; ++index)
00410                         {
00411                         if (table[index])
00412                                 {
00413                                 node = table[index];
00414                                 ptr  = table + index;
00415 
00416                                 do {
00417                                         if (stop_call_for_all_entry)
00418                                                 {
00419                                                 stop_call_for_all_entry = false;
00420 
00421                                                 return;
00422                                                 }
00423 
00424                                         if (function(node->key, node->elem))
00425                                                 {
00426                                                 *ptr = node->next; // lo si toglie dalla lista collisioni...
00427 
00428                                                 elem = (T*) node->elem;
00429 
00430                                                 u_destroy<T>(elem);
00431 
00432                                                 delete node;
00433 
00434                                                 --_length;
00435 
00436                                                 continue;
00437                                                 }
00438 
00439                                         ptr = &(*ptr)->next;
00440                                         }
00441                                 while ((node = *ptr));
00442                                 }
00443                         }
00444 
00445                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("_length = %u", _length)
00446                 }
00447 
00448         void assign(UHashMap<T*>& h)
00449                 {
00450                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::assign(%p)", &h)
00451 
00452                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_DIFFERS(this, &h)
00453                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(gperf, 0)
00454                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(ignore_case, h.ignore_case)
00455 
00456                 clear();
00457                 allocate(h._capacity);
00458 
00459                 T* elem;
00460                 UHashMapNode** ptr;
00461 
00462                 for (uint32_t index = 0; index < h._capacity; ++index)
00463                         {
00464                         if (h.table[index])
00465                                 {
00466                                 node = h.table[index];
00467                                 ptr  = table + index;
00468 
00469                                 do {
00470                                         *ptr = U_NEW(UHashMapNode(node, *ptr)); // lo si inserisce nella lista collisioni...
00471 
00472                                         elem = (T*) (*ptr)->elem;
00473 
00474                                         u_construct<T>(elem);
00475                                         }
00476                                 while ((node = node->next));
00477                                 }
00478                         }
00479 
00480                 _length = h._length;
00481                 }
00482 
00483 #ifdef DEBUG
00484         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UHashMap<void*>::dump(reset); }
00485 #endif
00486 
00487 private:
00488         UHashMap<T*>(const UHashMap<T*>&)            {}
00489         UHashMap<T*>& operator=(const UHashMap<T*>&) { return *this; }
00490 };

00494 template <> class U_EXPORT UHashMap<UString> : public UHashMap<UStringRep*> {
00495 public:
00496 
00497         // Costruttori e distruttore
00498 
00499         UHashMap(bool _ignore_case = false) : UHashMap<UStringRep*>(_ignore_case)
00500                 {
00501                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<UString>, "%b", _ignore_case)
00502                 }
00503 
00504         ~UHashMap()
00505                 {
00506                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UHashMap<UString>)
00507                 }
00508 
00509         // Inserimento e cancellazione elementi dalla tabella
00510 
00511         void insertAfterFind(const UString& key, const UString& str);
00512 
00513         void replaceAfterFind(const UString& str)
00514                 {
00515                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<T*>::replaceAfterFind(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(str))
00516 
00517                 UHashMap<UStringRep*>::replaceAfterFind(str.rep);
00518                 }
00519 
00520         void insert(const UString& key, const UString& str)
00521                 {
00522                 U_TRACE(0, "UHashMap<UString>::insert(%.*S,%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(key), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(str))
00523 
00524                 UHashMap<UStringRep*>::insert(key, str.rep);
00525 
00526                 _space += key.size() + str.size();
00527                 }
00528 
00529         UString erase(const UString& key);
00530 
00531         // OPERATOR []
00532 
00533         UString operator[](const char* key)        { UStringRep keyr(key); return at(&keyr); }
00534         UString operator[](const UString& key) {                                                                return at(key.rep); }
00535 
00536         // STREAMS
00537 
00538         friend U_EXPORT istream& operator>>(istream& is,       UHashMap<UString>& t);
00539         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UHashMap<UString>& t);
00540 
00541 protected:
00542         UString at(UStringRep* keyr);
00543 
00544 private:
00545         UHashMap<UString>(const UHashMap<UString>&) : UHashMap<UStringRep*>() {}
00546         UHashMap<UString>& operator=(const UHashMap<UString>&)                                   { return *this; }
00547 };
